code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{io}from"socket.io-client";import Content from'./Content';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const socket=io.connect("http://localhost:3001");function Admin(){const navigate=useNavigate();const[createRoom,setCreateRoom]=useState("");const[message,setReceiveMsg]=useState("");const handleClick=()=>{socket.emit("create_room",createRoom);};useEffect(()=>{socket.on("room_created_successfully",data=>{console.log("Room No : "+data.data);navigate('/Admin/Content');});socket.on("receive_message",data=>{setReceiveMsg(data.message);});},[socket]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("em",{children:"Enter the desired room in which you want to host your AUCTION"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Create Room....",onChange:e=>{setCreateRoom(e.target.value);}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleClick,children:"Create"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{})]});}export default Admin;
